mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX, A.MENU_NAME, A.MENU_ENAME, A.PARENT_IDX, A.MENU_IDX, A.ICON, A.CREA_DTM, A.CREA_ID, A.LINK, A.USE_YN, SUBSTRING_INDEX(LINK ,'/',2) AS MENU_POINT, CASE WHEN MENU_IDX > 0 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(LINK ,'/',3) ,'/',-1) ELSE NULL END AS MENU_POINT_SUB, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENU B WHERE A.PARENT_IDX = B.PARENT_IDX AND A.MENU_IDX < B.MENU_IDX) AS SUBMENU_CNT FROM TB_MENU A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY PARENT_IDX, MENU_IDX
